title: AKAI.MPCThe.Bank
description:
The Bank is a complete workstation exploding with all the essential sounds of modern production, including basses, leads, effects, keyboards and much, much more. Designed from the ground up as a tool for creating chart-topping tracks, The Bank is your go-to workstation for the most sought-after sounds in modern pop.


A Entire Vault of Customizable Sounds
At the heart of The Bank is a 128-voice sample-based synthesizer. Three envelopes are onboard for tweaking amp, pitch, and filter, and each can be further modified with The Bank’s LFO. Customize each of The Bank’s 300 sounds using three effects—delay, chorus, and reverb—and sync delay to the internal clock or let it run free.

Included with MPC Renaissance and MPC Studio. Compatible with MPC Software and MPC Essentials.

Features:
-300 radio-ready sounds
-128-voice sample-based synth
-3 envelopes for amp, pitch, and filter
-3 effects: chorus, delay, reverb
-Delay can sync to internal clock or run free
-Low-pass filter and LFO for modulation on filter, pitch, and amp
-Included with MPC Renaissance and MPC Studio

Requirements:
– Mac: 4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended) Mac OS X 10.6 or later
– PC: 3 GHz Pentium® 4 or Celeron® compatible CPU or faster (multicore CPU recommended) 4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended) Windows 7 (32 or 64-bit)
– MPC Software or MPC Essentials
